title: Burger King and Ford, Too Old Or Not, Antwon Rose Jr., Mass Shooting, Vegans, Cookout, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Burger King and Ford, Too Old Or Not, Antwon Rose Jr., Mass Shooting, Vegans, Cookout, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
We find out the places Uncle Steve has worked. Is jumping around in a bounce house not cool when you are a parent? The officer who shot Antwon Rose Jr. is charged with criminal homicide. The shooting at the Maryland newspaper marks the 154th mass shooting this year. What happens when vegans run their mouth at a cookout with meat lovers. Recharging one's battery can be beneficial. The CEO explains why 'Me Time' is so important in today's Closing Remarks and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
